detailsOfAchievement: Er. Perumal Manimekalai College of Engineering is recognized as Scientific and Industrial Research Organizations (SIRO) by Department of Scientific and Industrial Research. Our Institution is a unique entrepreneurship ecosystem that catalyses a startup company to transform its idea into a product that is commercially viable. Innovation and Entrepreneurship Development Centre was established to create entrepreneurial culture for the students and 20 projects are completed. The Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEâ€™s) has sanctioned a grant towards various innovative projects developed by the students. Our Institution involved actively in various sponsored research projects and has an excellent track record of carrying out sponsored programs from various funding agencies / bodies like DST, DRDO-SIGMA, DBT, MSME,AICTE, BRNS, DBT, CSI, The Institutions of Engineers (India), ISTE, IIT Bombay and IIT Kharagpur etc. in the domains of Small Satellite, 3D printing, Torque driven planar five bar closed chain mechanism, Simultaneous localization and mapping algorithms, Electro-Mechanical systems, Mobile imaging Technique, Augmented reality environment and rapid prototyping, Cyber Security, Computer Networking, Computer Programming, Engineering Mechanics, Database Management Systems, Android application programming etc. TECHNICAL EXHIBITION event organized for the students annually to showcase the next generation of technology & innovation projects. This programme makes the students to visualize / analyse needs of the nation; develop critical thinking about national issues and problems pertaining to everyday life, as well as, create awareness and inspire them to devise innovative ideas to address them. Follow-up mechanism to further fine tune the best creative ideas/concepts is being put in place of commercialization. Our Institution proposed to implement Solar steam cooking using Concentrated Solar true parabolic dishes through the support of MNRE. Our vision to provide professional excellence in society locally and globally through high quality and need based technical education with focus on superior competence and development of individual potential. This is a premier institute not only because of its excellent academic background but also because of its strong determination and commitment towards development of Innovative Technologies. Our Mission is to promote entrepreneurial leadership across all disciplines, facilitate entrepreneurial activity amongst students, and invite entrepreneurs to use Incubation Center services so as to develop end products for commercialization. We have predominant lab set up for 3D Printing where all projects prototype can be developed using Digital Technology. Our Institution offers State of the Art with remarkable Infrastructure where Engineering lab facilitates with all kinds of Modern Equipments for design and development. Our research center works in a proactive manner to lay a foundation for work in a particular area and based on this foundational work, submits concrete proposals to corporate R&D labs to develop innovative products. The centre aims at fostering innovative research and Entrepreneurial activities in technology and engineering based areas. Our Promotion of technology based new enterprises which creates value added jobs and services and after successful incubation, encourage and lead the teams towards setting up a business enterprise.
